id.description: Local identifier of the status report

command@id.description: Local identifier of the command that this report applies to

reportTime.description: Time at which this report was generated

percentCompletion.description: Current progress expressed as a percentage of total task execution

executionTime.description: Time period during which the command was executed or is scheduled to be executed (depending on status code)

message.description: Human readable message providing more details on the current status (can be both an error or information message depending on the status code)
